reviewText: great movie, she had great courage!!
It was really good. No complaints!
Watched it many times. A mom who only cares about one thing her kids. Loved the movie, will watch it many times.
watched it on cable and just had to buy it its just that good 0 skips 0 jumps exelent movie

An amazing movie about a single mother struggling to support her two sons. I watched this movie a while back on lifetime and was so excited to see it for sale. This movie is a must see especially for those struggling to receive child support.
I would recommend this movie to anyone who enjoys a powerful movie that will brighten your day and help you to see how all things are possible when you never give up.
